name: 1dDW_Grad_o_Mat++
author: AFNI Team
description: Manipulation of diffusion-weighted (DW) gradient vector files, b-value files, and b- or g-matrices with various input and output configurations.

inputs.description: Input file of 3 rows of gradients (e.g., dcm2nii-format output)
inputs.name: Input Row Vectors

inputs.description: Input file of 3 columns of gradients
inputs.name: Input Column Vectors

inputs.description: Input file of 6 columns of b- or g-matrix in 'A(FNI)' diagonal first format
inputs.name: Input Columns Matrix A

inputs.description: Input file of 6 columns of b- or g-matrix in 'T(ORTOISE)' row first format
inputs.name: Input Columns Matrix T

inputs.description: Change sign of first column of gradients (or of the x-component parts of the matrix)
inputs.name: Flip X

inputs.description: Change sign of second column of gradients (or of the y-component parts of the matrix)
inputs.name: Flip Y

inputs.description: Change sign of third column of gradients (or of the z-component parts of the matrix)
inputs.name: Flip Z

inputs.description: Don't change any gradient/matrix signs (default behavior)
inputs.name: No Flip

inputs.description: Output file of 3 rows of gradients
inputs.name: Output Row Vectors

inputs.description: Output file of 3 columns of gradients
inputs.name: Output Column Vectors

inputs.description: Output file of 6 columns of b- or g-matrix in 'A(FNI)' diagonal first format
inputs.name: Output Columns Matrix A

inputs.description: Output file of 6 columns of b- or g-matrix in 'T(ORTOISE)' row first format
inputs.name: Output Columns Matrix T

inputs.description: BVAL_FILE is a file of b-values either in a single row or a single column
inputs.name: Input B-Values

inputs.description: Switch to put a column of the bvalues as the first column in the output data
inputs.name: Output Column B-Values

inputs.description: Output a file of bvalues in a single row
inputs.name: Output Row B-Values File

inputs.description: Output a file of bvalues in a single column
inputs.name: Output Column B-Values File

inputs.description: Switch to scale each vector/matrix from the INFILE to either unit or zero magnitude
inputs.name: Unit Magnitude Output

inputs.description: Specify the threshold to replace small negative diagonal elements with zero in the input matrix
inputs.name: Check Absolute Minimum

inputs.description: When averaging the reference 'b0' values, represent the mean of X values in the top row
inputs.name: Reference Mean Top

inputs.description: Add a row at the top with all zeros in the output format
inputs.name: Put Zeros at Top

inputs.description: THRESH is a scalar number below which b-values are considered zero or reference
inputs.name: Maximum Reference B-Value Threshold

output-files.description: Output file of gradients or matrices
output-files.name: Output File

output-files.description: Output b-values file in a single row
output-files.name: Output Row B-Values File

output-files.description: Output b-values file in a single column
output-files.name: Output Column B-Values File
